sentence: I can smell the fresh bread from the bakery next door.
我能闻到隔壁面包店新鲜面包的香味。
He smelt the flowers in the garden yesterday afternoon.
昨天下午他在花园里闻了那些花。
My new pillow is very soft and comfortable to sleep on.
我的新枕头很柔软，睡在上面很舒服。
The milk tastes sour, so we should not drink it.
这牛奶尝起来酸了，所以我们不应该喝它。
My mother baked some delicious chocolate cookies for us.
我妈妈为我们烤了一些美味的巧克力饼干。
Mm, this soup your mom made is really tasty!
嗯，你妈妈做的这个汤真好吃！
We often order a large pizza to share on Friday nights.
我们经常在周五晚上点一个大披萨一起分享。
We had a lovely time at the park with our classmates.
我们在公园和同学们度过了愉快的时光。
I have just done all my homework for the weekend.
我刚刚完成了周末的所有作业。
You should try this new game; it is very interesting.
你应该试试这个新游戏，它非常有趣。
I am not good at drawing, but I will have a try.
我不擅长画画，但我会试一试。
My grandma makes the best apple pie in the world.
我奶奶做的苹果派是世界上最好的。
The sound of rain helps me fall asleep quickly.
雨声帮助我快速入睡。
My little brother has a sweet tooth and loves candies.
我的弟弟爱吃甜食，喜欢糖果。
Please pass me the salt; I need some for my eggs.
请把盐递给我，我的鸡蛋需要加一点。
I spread some strawberry jam on my toast every morning.
我每天早上都在吐司上涂一些草莓酱。
My sister wears glasses when she reads books.
我姐姐看书时会戴眼镜。
I usually wear jeans and a T-shirt to school.
我通常穿牛仔裤和T恤去上学。
She felt very nervous before her first piano competition.
在她第一次钢琴比赛前，她感到非常紧张。
Our teacher is always fair when she gives us marks.
我们的老师在给我们打分时总是很公平。
The garden looks pretty with all the colorful flowers.
花园里开满五颜六色的花，看起来很漂亮。
My parents are proud of my good grades at school.
我的父母为我学校的好成绩感到骄傲。
You should be proud of yourself for finishing the race.
你应该为自己完成比赛而感到骄傲。
My mother told me never to talk to a stranger on the street.
我妈妈告诉我永远不要和街上的陌生人说话。
I left a message on your phone about our meeting time.
我在你手机上留言了，是关于我们开会时间的。
Can sb help me carry these heavy books to the classroom?
有人能帮我把这些沉重的书搬到教室吗？
Reading is my favourite hobby in my free time.
阅读是我空闲时最喜欢的爱好。
We learn many interesting subjects at school together.
我们在学校一起学习许多有趣的科目。
I hope to get a good mark on the English test tomorrow.
我希望在明天的英语测验中取得好成绩。
Have you ever visited the Science Museum in our city?
你曾经参观过我们市的科学博物馆吗？
Please knock on the door before you enter the teacher's office.
进入老师办公室前请先敲门。
Our class won first place in the singing competition last week.
我们班在上周的歌唱比赛中赢得了第一名。
She received a special prize for her beautiful painting.
她因那幅美丽的画而获得了一个特别奖。
Winning the first prize made him very happy and excited.
赢得一等奖让他感到非常高兴和兴奋。
My dream is to become a doctor and help sick people.
我的梦想是成为一名医生，帮助生病的人。
Last night, I dreamed about flying over the mountains.
昨晚，我梦到飞越群山。
She dreamt of traveling around the world when she was young.
她年轻时常梦想环游世界。
For homework, we need to write about our summer holiday.
家庭作业要求我们写一写我们的暑假。
You can borrow my bike as long as you return it before 5 pm.
只要你下午5点前归还，就可以借我的自行车。
My family will move to a new house next month.
我的家人下个月将搬到一个新房子。
I will send an email to my pen pal in Canada tonight.
我今晚将给我在加拿大的笔友发一封电子邮件。
My uncle lives in Germany and works as an engineer.
我的叔叔住在德国，是一名工程师。
We learned about the Eiffel Tower in France in geography class.
我们在地理课上学到了法国的埃菲尔铁塔。
The clock tower in the city centre is over a hundred years old.
市中心的钟楼已有一百多年的历史。
We saw many ancient buildings during our trip to Beijing.
在我们去北京的旅行中，我们看到了许多古建筑。
The king in the story was very kind to his people.
故事中的国王对他的子民非常仁慈。
The young queen in the movie was both brave and wise.
电影中的年轻女王既勇敢又聪明。
Arabic is a difficult but beautiful language to learn.
阿拉伯语是一门难学但优美的语言。
First, you need to mix the flour and eggs in a bowl.
首先，你需要把面粉和鸡蛋在碗里混合。
I miss my best friend because she moved to another city.
我想念我最好的朋友，因为她搬到了另一个城市。
Can you help me count the number of students in our class?
你能帮我数一下我们班的学生人数吗？
We started to count down from ten on New Year's Eve.
我们在除夕夜开始从十倒数。
The Earth goes around the Sun once every year.
地球每年绕太阳转一圈。
My father watches the news on TV every evening after dinner.
我父亲每天晚上饭后看电视新闻。
Mars is a planet that is next to the Earth.
火星是紧挨着地球的一颗行星。
I cannot reach the top shelf because I am not tall enough.
我够不到顶层的架子，因为我不够高。
He has not finished his project for school yet.
他还没有完成他的学校项目。
I just finished reading an interesting book about space.
我刚读完一本关于太空的有趣的书。
My brother likes to build model planes in his room.
我的哥哥喜欢在他的房间里制作飞机模型。
The spacecraft will send pictures back to scientists on Earth.
宇宙飞船将把图片发回给地球上的科学家。
Our science project this term is about the solar system.
我们这学期的科学项目是关于太阳系的。
'Can you help me with this question?' 'Sure, no problem.'
'你能帮我解答这个问题吗？''当然，没问题。'
I want to buy the latest book by my favourite writer.
我想买我最喜欢的作家的最新著作。
Scientists hope to discover new planets in the future.
科学家们希望在未来发现新的行星。
The astronaut talked to students about life in space.
那位宇航员向学生们讲述了太空中的生活。
Space travel may become common for people in the future.
未来太空旅行对人们来说可能会变得普遍。
None of the students in my class failed the math test.
我们班上没有一个学生数学测验不及格。
It is important to protect the environment for future generations.
为子孙后代保护环境非常重要。
We learned about solar energy in our science lesson.
我们在科学课上学到了太阳能。
Our school is testing a new computer system this month.
我们学校这个月正在测试一个新的计算机系统。
We made a model of the solar system for our science project.
我们为科学项目制作了一个太阳系模型。
We work in a group of four for our English class activity.
我们在英语课堂活动中四人一组进行合作。
Our Milky Way is just one galaxy among many in the universe.
我们的银河系只是宇宙中众多星系中的一个。
The universe is so large that we cannot imagine its size.
宇宙如此之大，我们无法想象它的大小。
It is impossible to finish all this homework in one hour.
在一小时内完成所有这些家庭作业是不可能的。
Please take out your English book and turn to page 25.
请拿出你的英语书，翻到第25页。
We can use the internet to communicate with people far away.
我们可以使用互联网与远方的人们交流。
I have a bad cough, so my mother made me some honey tea.
我咳得厉害，所以我妈妈给我泡了些蜂蜜茶。
You have a high fever and should stay in bed today.
你发高烧了，今天应该卧床休息。
I cannot play football because I have a terrible headache.
我不能踢足球，因为我头疼得厉害。
Eating too much ice cream sometimes gives me a stomach ache.
吃太多冰淇淋有时会让我肚子疼。
My legs ache after running for an hour in PE class.
在体育课跑了一小时后，我的腿很疼。
She had a stomach ache after eating too much chocolate.
她吃了太多巧克力后肚子疼。
I need to see the dentist because I have a bad toothache.
我需要看牙医，因为我牙疼得厉害。
I have known my best friend since we were in primary school.
我从小学就认识我最好的朋友了。
We learned how to use 'because' as a conj in English class.
我们在英语课上学了如何将'because'用作连词。
It is very cold outside, so remember to wear your coat.
外面很冷，所以记得穿上你的外套。
If you go out in the rain, you might catch a cold.
如果你冒雨出去，可能会感冒。
My dad will take me to the cinema this Saturday afternoon.
我爸爸这周六下午会带我去电影院。
Eating too much fast food is not good for our health.
吃太多快餐对我们的健康不好。
Good health is more important than anything else in life.
良好的健康比生活中任何其他东西都重要。
Running every morning is good for your heart and body.
每天早上跑步对你的心脏和身体都有好处。
My grandfather is very active and goes for a walk every day.
我的祖父非常活跃，每天都去散步。
My little pet dog always waits for me at the door.
我的小宠物狗总是在门口等我。
Every member of our family helps with the housework.
我们家的每个成员都帮忙做家务。
All students are welcome to take part in the school sports day.
欢迎所有学生参加学校运动会。
You must keep your books in good condition.
你必须保持你的书完好无损。
This old book is still in excellent condition after many years.
这本旧书历经多年仍然保存完好。
I feel sleepy in class if I do not get enough sleep.
如果睡眠不足，我在上课时会感到困倦。
Drinking milk daily helps children grow strong and healthy.
每天喝牛奶有助于孩子们长得强壮健康。
After being ill, I still feel a bit weak and tired.
生病之后，我仍然感到有点虚弱和疲倦。
A good rest can help you recover from your illness quickly.
好好休息可以帮助你从疾病中快速康复。
I had an awful headache yesterday and could not study.
我昨天头疼得厉害，无法学习。
She feels awful because she did not do well in the exam.
她感觉糟透了，因为她考试没考好。
After playing football, I was dirty all over.
踢完足球后，我浑身都脏了。
Perhaps we can go to the library together after school.
也许放学后我们可以一起去图书馆。
My favourite cartoon character is always brave and kind.
我最喜欢的卡通人物总是勇敢而善良。
Many people think the actor in the movie is very handsome.
许多人认为电影里的那位演员非常英俊。
She is a smart student and always gets good grades.
她是个聪明的学生，总是取得好成绩。
The sky is clear and blue without any clouds today.
今天天空晴朗湛蓝，万里无云。
The two heroes in the story fight against the evil monster.
故事中的两位英雄与邪恶的怪物战斗。
The firefighter is a true hero because he saves people's lives.
那位消防员是真正的英雄，因为他拯救人们的生命。
Our new English teacher is very humorous and makes us laugh.
我们的新英语老师非常幽默，常逗我们发笑。
I can swim very well because I practice every summer.
我游泳游得很好，因为我每年夏天都练习。
The funny movie made all of us laugh a lot.
那部有趣的电影让我们大家都笑得很开心。
I have an orange-and-white cat that is very friendly.
我有一只橘白相间的猫，非常友好。
'Big' is an adj that we often use to describe size.
'Big'是一个我们常用来描述大小的形容词。
Some people think the building is ugly, but I like its design.
有些人认为这栋楼很丑，但我喜欢它的设计。
The kind princess soon won the heart of everyone in the kingdom.
善良的公主很快就赢得了王国里每个人的心。
My schoolbag is heavy because it has many books inside.
我的书包很重，因为里面有很多书。
The teacher asked a student to lead the group discussion.
老师让一个学生来引导小组讨论。
As it is raining, we will have our PE class indoors today.
因为正在下雨，我们今天将在室内上体育课。
My brother's room is always a mess with toys everywhere.
我弟弟的房间总是一团糟，玩具到处都是。
The quiet beach was like heaven for us during the holiday.
那个安静的海滩在假期里对我们来说就像天堂一样。
I expect to get a letter from my pen pal next week.
我期待下周能收到笔友的来信。
The young artist can draw beautiful pictures of nature.
那位年轻的艺术家能画出美丽的大自然图画。
Thomas Edison worked hard to invent the light bulb.
托马斯·爱迪生努力发明了电灯泡。
Please do not copy your classmate's answers in the test.
考试时请不要抄袭你同学的答案。
My grandfather likes to watch old black-and-white movies.
我的祖父喜欢看老的黑白电影。
My dream is to have my own room when I grow up.
我的梦想是长大后拥有自己的房间。
This diary is private, so please do not read it.
这本日记是私人的，所以请不要阅读。
The teacher's explanation did not satisfy my curiosity.
老师的解释没有满足我的好奇心。
I am a big fan of this singer and have all her CDs.
我是这位歌手的超级粉丝，拥有她所有的CD。
My hobby is collecting stamps from different countries.
我的爱好是收集不同国家的邮票。
We need to tidy up our classroom before we go home.
我们需要在回家前把教室收拾整齐。
Please put the dictionary back on the shelf after using it.
使用后请将字典放回书架上。
Can I have a look at the photos you took during the trip?
我能看一看你在旅行期间拍的照片吗？
I found an old coin under my grandmother's sofa yesterday.
我昨天在祖母的沙发下发现了一枚旧硬币。
My mother left a note on the table to remind me.
我妈妈在桌子上留了张纸条提醒我。
This book costs five pounds at the bookstore.
这本书在书店卖五英镑。
I saved ten dollars to buy a birthday present for my mom.
我省下了十美元给妈妈买生日礼物。
You must finish your homework before you watch TV.
你必须在看电视之前完成作业。
Time is the most valuable thing we have in our lives.
时间是我们生命中最宝贵的东西。
I like to drink tea with a little sugar in the morning.
我喜欢早上喝加一点糖的茶。
My grandmother taught me the value of being honest.
我的祖母教会了我诚实的价值。
He is a very kind person and always helps others.
他是个非常善良的人，总是帮助别人。
My main interest is playing the piano after school.
我的主要兴趣是放学后弹钢琴。
Learning a new language is a useful skill for everyone.
学习一门新语言对每个人来说都是一项有用的技能。
Our favourite activity in the summer is swimming in the pool.
我们夏天最喜欢的活动是在游泳池里游泳。
My uncle enjoys sailing on the lake during the weekends.
我的叔叔喜欢在周末去湖上航行。
My parents always encourage me to try my best in everything.
我的父母总是鼓励我在每件事上都尽力而为。
The new magazine will come out in bookshops next Monday.
新杂志将于下周一在书店上架。
The result of the match made all the fans very happy.
比赛的结果让所有的球迷都非常高兴。
He studied very hard, and as a result, he passed the exam.
他学习非常努力，结果他通过了考试。
It is a great pleasure to help my classmates with their studies.
帮助同学们学习是一件非常愉快的事。
Hard work is the key to success in any field.
努力工作是任何领域取得成功的关键。
My mother made a shopping list before going to the supermarket.
我妈妈去超市前列了一张购物清单。
I need to make a list of things to do during the holiday.
我需要列一份假期要做的事情的清单。
My friends think I am crazy to get up at 5 am for running.
我的朋友们认为我早上5点起床跑步是疯了。
We have a big party at the end of the school year.
我们在学年末有一个盛大的聚会。
I usually wear shorts when I play basketball in the summer.
我夏天打篮球时通常穿短裤。
You should wear sunglasses to protect your eyes on sunny days.
在阳光明媚的日子，你应该戴太阳镜来保护眼睛。
I did a homestay with a friendly family in Australia last summer.
去年夏天我在澳大利亚一个友好的家庭寄宿。
The doctor asked me to weigh myself every week.
医生要求我每周称体重。
The total number of students in our school is over a thousand.
我们学校的学生总数超过一千人。
Eating healthy food helps me keep a good weight.
吃健康的食物有助于我保持良好的体重。
You need a passport to travel to another country.
你需要护照才能去另一个国家旅行。
We learned about Japanese culture in our geography class.
我们在地理课上学到了日本文化。
We cannot watch TV and do our homework at the same time.
我们不能同时看电视和做作业。
The science lesson lasted for two hours yesterday afternoon.
昨天下午的科学课持续了两个小时。
Whether we go for a picnic depends on the weather tomorrow.
我们是否去野餐取决于明天的天气。
Your success depends on how hard you work every day.
你的成功取决于你每天有多努力。
The school library provides many interesting books for students.
学校图书馆为学生提供许多有趣的书籍。
We will have a vocabulary test in English class next Friday.
我们下周五英语课将有一次词汇测验。
My English teacher is happy with my progress this term.
我的英语老师对我这学期的进步感到高兴。
We prepared a nice meal for the guest from America.
我们为来自美国的客人准备了一顿美餐。
Mobile phones are important in our daily life now.
手机现在在我们的日常生活中很重要。
Please fill in this form with your name and address.
请在这张表格上填写你的姓名和地址。
Friendship between classmates is very important at school.
同学之间的友谊在学校里非常重要。
We promise to stay in touch after we go to different high schools.
我们承诺在去了不同的高中后保持联系。
I prefer reading books to playing computer games.
与玩电脑游戏相比，我更喜欢看书。
I am certain that I put my keys on the table this morning.
我确信我今天早上把钥匙放在桌子上了。
Can you help me fill this bottle with water, please?
你能帮我把这个瓶子装满水吗？
Every student needs to fill out this health form.
每个学生都需要填写这张健康表格。
I can hardly hear the teacher because the classroom is too noisy.
我几乎听不见老师说话，因为教室太吵了。
I want to take up a new hobby like painting this year.
今年我想开始一项新的爱好，比如绘画。
The teacher pointed out several mistakes in my homework.
老师指出了我作业中的几个错误。
We visited all the famous sights in the city during our trip.
我们在旅行期间参观了这座城市所有著名的景点。
After playing basketball, I felt very thirsty and drank some water.
打完篮球后，我感到很口渴，喝了些水。
There is a small flag at the top of the school building.
在学校楼的顶部有一面小旗子。
Do not waste water when you brush your teeth.
刷牙时不要浪费水。
There is a beautiful fountain in the town square.
镇广场上有一个美丽的喷泉。
My home is about two kilometres away from our school.
我家离学校大约两公里远。
The shape of the moon changes every night.
月亮的形状每晚都在变化。
Water and air are important for all human life.
水和空气对所有人类生命都很重要。
I usually wake up at seven o'clock on school days.
上学日我通常七点醒来。
I was woken by the sound of heavy rain this morning.
今天早上我被大雨的声音吵醒了。
My mother wakes me every morning for school.
我妈妈每天早晨叫醒我去上学。
Somebody left their umbrella in the classroom yesterday.
昨天有人把雨伞落在教室里了。
We read a story about a brave knight in English class.
我们在英语课上读了一个关于勇敢骑士的故事。
We walked along a narrow path through the forest.
我们沿着一条穿过森林的狭窄小路行走。
Can you help me pull this heavy box to the corner?
你能帮我把这个沉重的箱子拉到角落去吗？
We cannot drink seawater, but we need freshwater to live.
我们不能喝海水，但我们需要淡水才能生存。
If you have a problem, you can call the school helpline.
如果你有问题，可以拨打学校帮助热线。
The teacher asked us to separate into groups of four.
老师要求我们分成四人小组。
Can you explain this math problem to me again, please?
你能再给我解释一下这道数学题吗？
I had to refuse his invitation because I was too busy.
我不得不拒绝他的邀请，因为我太忙了。
My parents will treat me to dinner for my good grades.
我的父母会因为我的好成绩请我吃晚饭。
She made the birthday cake all by herself.
她完全是自己做的生日蛋糕。
I am not sure whether it will rain tomorrow or not.
我不确定明天是否会下雨。
The old man felt lonely after his children moved away.
孩子们搬走后，那位老人感到孤独。
I regret that I did not study harder for the test.
我后悔没有为那次测验更加努力地学习。
A good teacher is always patient with her students.
一位好老师对她的学生总是很有耐心。
Let me introduce my new classmate to all of you.
让我向你们大家介绍我的新同学。
All the students are welcome to join in the singing game.
欢迎所有学生参加这个唱歌游戏。
There was silence in the library when everyone was reading.
当每个人都在阅读时，图书馆里一片寂静。
We listened to the music in silence and enjoyed it.
我们静静地听着音乐，享受其中。
Please pass the salt to me during dinner.
请吃饭时把盐递给我。
The sun is very bright today, so wear your hat.
今天太阳很亮，所以戴上你的帽子。
We should treasure the time we spend with our family.
我们应该珍惜与家人共度的时光。
My English is improving day by day with more practice.
通过更多的练习，我的英语一天天在进步。
Good friends should always trust each other.
好朋友应该总是相互信任。
Does the price of the book include the delivery cost?
这本书的价格包括运费吗？
The children sat in a circle and played a game.
孩子们围坐成一个圆圈玩游戏。
We use glue to stick the pictures onto the paper.
我们用胶水把图片粘到纸上。
Can I borrow your glue to fix my broken notebook?
我能借你的胶水来修补我破损的笔记本吗？
My teacher gave me a good suggestion about how to study.
我的老师给了我一个关于如何学习的好建议。
The director of the movie is very famous around the world.
这部电影的导演在世界各地都很有名。
Can you show me how to solve this difficult problem?
你能教我怎么解这道难题吗？
We walked around the lake and enjoyed the beautiful view.
我们绕着湖散步，欣赏美丽的景色。
My father will show me how to ride a bike this weekend.
我爸爸这个周末将教我如何骑自行车。
The radio station is on air from six in the morning.
这个广播电台从早上六点开始播音。
You should avoid making the same mistake next time.
你应该避免下次再犯同样的错误。
The background of the photo is a beautiful mountain.
这张照片的背景是一座美丽的山。
The National Day holiday is a happy time for our family.
国庆节假期对我们家来说是一段快乐的时光。
English is an important international language.
英语是一门重要的国际语言。
The presenter on the TV show spoke very clearly.
电视节目上的主持人说话非常清晰。
The reporter will interview some students about school life.
记者将采访一些学生关于学校生活的情况。
You seem very happy today. Did something good happen?
你今天看起来很高兴。有什么好事发生吗？
A good listener is important in a conversation.
在谈话中，一个好的倾听者很重要。
I hope to meet my favourite writer in person one day.
我希望有一天能亲自见到我最喜欢的作家。
My brother has a part-time job in a supermarket.
我哥哥在一家超市有一份兼职工作。
I read an interesting article about space in the magazine.
我在杂志上读到一篇关于太空的有趣文章。
The singer is recording a new song in the studio now.
那位歌手现在正在录音棚录制一首新歌。
The main purpose of our meeting is to plan the class trip.
我们会议的主要目的是计划班级旅行。
